card1.title: Training
card1.caption: We provide all our customers with all the necessary materials and training to run the X°Cryo nitrogen.

card2.title: Right to your doorstep
card2.caption: 'We deliver the X°Cryo right to your doorstep in Sweden, Norway, Denmark and Iceland.

card3.title: Trust & safety
card3.caption: Our cryo-machine holds the highest standard when it comes to product safety.

card4.title: Need help?
card4.caption: Any questions regarding the cryomachine X°Cryo are just a phone call away. Diagnostics and service can be done via Remote Connection over the Internet.

delivery.heading: Delivery
delivery.slide1: We deliver X°Cryo, X°Tone and Cryocabin right to your doorstep in Sweden, Norway, Denmark and Iceland.
delivery.slide2: We take full responsibility during the delivery process. The equipment will not be subjected to any damage.
delivery.slide3: Our company values every customer and that is why we deliver the product as fast as it is possible.
delivery.slide4: Just state your name, e-mail and the prone. Our operator will contact you to organize a delivery process.

orYouCanSendUsMessage: Or you can send us a message
iAgreeCryo: I agree that my personal data is processed in accordance with CryoCenter's

error.name: Name should be at least 2 characters
error.policy: You should agree to our Privacy policy in order to proceed

getStartedCaption: Place your order in queue. We will contact you as soon as we are ready to ship our products.
copyright: On our website you can find the entire range of cryolipolysis devices. Each of them is guaranteed to be surprised with its functionality, price, and will be an extremely successful purchase. With it, your business will attract the attention of many hi-tech connoisseurs. Make sure of it right now by leaving a request and announcing the sale or purchase of equipment for aesthetic procedures.
